description:
Hatanaka Hiroshi is the Yakuza who grabbed http://anidb.net/ch9637 [Kishimoto] after she appeared naked, and dragged her off to the back room to rape her. His horrible actions were stopped by http://anidb.net/ch11788 [Katou].
He was killed in the Onion Alien mission, as the father alien grabbed him and used him as a shield against someone`s shot, thus him getting hit, and exploding.
name: Hatanaka Hiroshi
